name: Glow & Handsome Rapid Action Instant Brightness Facewash
description:
Protect your skin from dust, dirt, and harmful sun exposure. Specially designed for the man of today, these Glow & Handsome max men's face wash is a must-have in your kit. Made from water, glycerin, and myristic acid, the face wash keeps your skin soft and smooth. The oil-free formula retains the natural moisture of the skin keeping it hydrated for hours together. Get a fairer skin tone with regular use of this face wash. Wash your face twice a day with Glow & Handsome Max Men Face Wash and notice a visible difference in your skin.

name: Garnier Skin Active Micellar Cleansing Water
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in India and its raw materials are collected from France. Discover the cleansing power of Garnier Skin Active Micellar Cleansing Water, a 125 ml bottle of gentle yet effective makeup remover and facial cleanser. Garnier, a brand known for its commitment to skincare innovation, offers you a micellar water that simplifies your daily cleansing routine. This micellar water effortlessly removes makeup, dirt, and impurities, leaving your skin refreshed, clean, and hydrated.

name: Nivea Men Protect & Care Face Wash
description:
• Protect Skin: Highly protective and caring mens face wash protects your skin's natural barrier and leaves skin looking clear and healthy-looking  • Deep Refreshment: Deeply cleansing face wash gently recharges and refreshes your skin; face cleaner for deeply clean skin that feels refreshed and oil-free  • Thoroughly Cleanse: Protect and Care Face Wash pore cleaner cleanses your skin and helps to clear away impurities and oil without leaving the skin feeling dry  • Vitamin Formula: The face cleansing formula with Aloe Vera and Pro-Vitamin B5 instantly refreshes your skin while protecting your skin's natural barrier  • Caring Gel: Our face and beard wash cares for your skin and is designed to thoroughly remove dirt and excess oils without drying out the skin leaving clean     How To Use:  Step 1 - Squeeze a pea-sized amount onto your palm and lather up  Step 2 - Massage over wet face avoiding the eye area  Step 3 - Rinse off with clean water and pat dry  Step 4 - For best result use NIVEA MEN Moisturizer after washing your face.
